title: I know a secret
creator_credit: Bruce Pittman, Janice Platt, Seaton McLean, Michael Macmillan and Atlantis Films
brief_description: A film adaptation of a short story by Lucy Maud Montgomery set during a period in the late 1930’s. The story is about a young girl, called Lane Lawrence, and some children she becomes acquainted with after she moves to the country with her mother to live.
